name: bitflow
description: ![Bitflow](https://github.com/shruggr/Bitflow/bitflow.png "Bitflow") Layout schema workflows that process payouts

scripts.build:proto: pbjs -w commonjs -t static-module -o functions/lib/bitflow-proto.js bitflow-unity/Assets/Definitions/bitflow.proto && pbts -o functions/src/bitflow-proto.d.ts functions/lib/bitflow-proto.js
